short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulate Ethereum wallet connections with any address

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that emulates Ethereum wallet functionality, enabling users and developers to test app interactions without a real wallet. It offers an easy way to simulate wallet connections with either a randomly generated Ethereum address, ENS names like vitalik.eth, or a custom address you specifyâ€”ideal for testing features or checking airdrop eligibility safely. 

Network supported: Ethereum Mainnet and Testnets, Arbitrum, Base and Optimism.
